title: Pixel 2 Can Only Make Emergency Calls Under Wifi-Calling
content:
My Google Fi Pixel 2 used to make and receive calls/texts just fine at home over wifi (we do not have cell signals where we live); just in the past week, however, the phone only allows Emergency Calls at home (wifi), os no calls/texts come in or go out. 

I did not make any change to the phone's settings - it just stopped working at home, under wifi-calling. 

Help? Thanks.
